title: Stasis
data:
{{version031}}
The '''stasis''' intrinsic, exclusive to [[Formicid]]s, provides immunity from a wide variety of time and space altering effects:

*[[Teleportation]]
**including [[Vhi's Electric Charge]]
**excluding level shifts in [[the Abyss]]
*[[Blink]]ing
*[[Haste]], [[Slow]], and [[Swiftness]]
*[[Paralyze|Paralysis]]
*[[Berserk]]

Stasis '''will not''' block any of the following:
*Effects that warp space ''around'' you: [[Passage of Golubria]], [[Hepliaklqana]]'s Transference, Abyss shifts
*[[Okawaru]]'s Finesse
*"Paralysis" inflicted by the onset of [[stat zero]]
*[[Transporter]]s (not to be confused with [[teleport trap]]s)
*[[Banishment]]
*Other disabling effects like [[Petrify]] or [[Sleep]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.25]], stasis did not block Swiftness.
*In [[0.18]], the [[amulet of stasis]] was removed, the primary and only way for most characters to get this intrinsic.
*Prior to [[0.18]], stasis blocked [[Okawaru]]'s Finesse.
